summary: A new Rookie team has been assigned to complete their training with Stormer and his crew - but someone from Stormer's past is trying to take down the Hero Factory and Stormer himself.
cast: John Schneider|Henry Winkler|Eric Christian Olsen|Malcolm McDowell|Christopher B. Duncan|Stephen Stanton|Bryton James|Jean Louisa Kelly|Mark Hamill|Joel Swetow|Jeff Bennett|Fred Tatasciore|Charlie Adler|Jennifer Coolidge
title: Lego Hero Factory: Rise of the Rookies
